imdb.title: Nagasarete Airantô
imdb.plot: A young boy ends up trapped on an deserted island. But he's not alone, as the island hosts a community of beautiful girls who are all after him.

episodes.title: Nagasarete, paradaisu!?
episodes.plot: Ikuto Tohoin falls off a travelling ship and washes up on an island completely inhabited by women. AS the only male on the island, all the girls go wild over him and he tries to escape.

episodes.title: Oikakerarete, mukodono
episodes.plot: Obaba sets up a tournament to decide who will become Ikuto's bride.

episodes.title: Yakudatte, isôrô
episodes.plot: Ikuto tries to help out on the island, but finds himself outclassed by the girls' superhuman chores.

episodes.title: Nigete no garete, oneesama/Odoroite, akuryô
episodes.plot: Ayane accidentally eats her older sister Machi's food and runs from from her. Later, Suzu breaks a small statue and a spirit comes after her.

episodes.title: Sagashite, Kuma Kuma
episodes.plot: Yukino's bear friend Kuma-Kuma goes missing and Ikuto and Suzu help her out in the search.

episodes.title: Attakakute, onsen
episodes.plot: During an earthquake, the hot spring that supplies bathwater to the entire island gets blocked.

episodes.title: Nyandate, oshishô-sama/Mitakutte, Sakura
episodes.plot: The cats and dogs have a contest to see who is better. Later, everyone goes to see a special cherry tree.

episodes.title: Manekarete, kansatsusha
episodes.plot: Ikuto and Suzu are invited to Chikage's western-style home for dinner. However, Chikage wants to secretly observe Ikuto since she has never had the chance to study a human male before.

episodes.title: Misetakute, atotori
episodes.plot: Rin invites Ikuto to help her with a construction project, hoping to use this opportunity to impress him.

episodes.title: Ame datte, tomodachi!
episodes.plot: A rainy day means that everyone on the island can take a day off. However, the rain reminds Suzu of her late mother.

episodes.title: Hyakkokute, kôritori
episodes.plot: Suzu has a fever, so Ikuto must head to the mountain to get ice to relieve her.

episodes.title: Oishikute, hanayome shugyô
episodes.plot: Machi learns to cook from Rin, and afterwards she invites Ikuto and Suzu for dinner. But can it be eaten?

episodes.title: Aitakute, Ikuto
episodes.plot: When the girls find a picture of a girl in Ikuto's possessions, they believe it is his lost lover and they try their own forms of consolation.

episodes.title: Hazukashikute, kigurumi
episodes.plot: An unknown robber is stealing food from many people on the island.

episodes.title: Naoshitakutte, Mei Mei
episodes.plot: The painfully shy Mei Mei has difficulty interacting with the island's other residents. Ikuto and Suzu attempt to cheer her up and help her adapt.

episodes.title: Kachitotte, ô no za
episodes.plot: The island's territory leaders have a clash, and Mei Mei gets caught in the middle.

episodes.title: Torikaete, mahô
episodes.plot: Chikage found a magic book and decided to use the spells locked in it, which causes the animals to become humans and the humans to become animals.

episodes.title: Teawaseshite, ninja
episodes.plot: Ikuto is challenged to a match by the female ninja Shinobu.

episodes.title: Nazomeite, tantei (zenpen)
episodes.plot: Ikuto and Suzu are invited to a hot springs resort, but their restful stay is interrupted by a masked fiend.

episodes.title: Nazomeite, tantei (kôhen)
episodes.plot: Ikuto confronts Beniyasha, but things don't go as expected.

episodes.title: Bakasarete, Ponpoko
episodes.plot: Ayane accidentally unleashes a mischievous raccoon spirit.

episodes.title: Mitsuketakutte, aoitori
episodes.plot: The first blue bird on the island is discovered and all the girls chase after it.

episodes.title: Tsureteitte, terakoya
episodes.plot: Suzu hates studying so much that she runs away from the school building or even anyone mentioning school or studying. Ikuto and all the others come up with a plan to help her change this attitude.

episodes.title: Nagaretsuite, binzume
episodes.plot: When a message in a bottle arrives at the island from Ikuto's sister Misaki, he and the girls strive to leave the island to find Misaki.

episodes.title: Kitaete, henachoko
episodes.plot: Suzu and Ikuto search for a key that would open a special gate to a Sea Dragon God, which can allow Ikuto to leave the island.

episodes.title: Tobidashite, Airantô
episodes.plot: Ikuto finally leaves the island and locates his sister Misaki. But now what will he do?
